metadata.name: Obex — Business Parameters
metadata.description: Obex PnL calculation modules. Simplest star — Maximum Debt Fees equals Net Amount with no reimbursements or subsidies.

calculationModules.name: Step 4: Sky Direct Exposure
calculationModules.notes: Maple position handled via custom formula (see known issue in maple-assets.denna-spec.json)

parameters.settlementFormula: Net Amount = Maximum Debt Fees (no reimbursements, no subsidies). Obex pays the full base rate on its debt with no offsets.
